LanguageData.CookRoastedMochi5.label: 烤米饼(5)
LanguageData.CookRoastedMochi5.description: 将冻过的米饼烘焙一下
LanguageData.CookThreeColoredDumplings5.label: 三色团子(5)
LanguageData.CookThreeColoredDumplings5.description: 用冻过的米饼和砂糖搅拌着色来制作三色团子
LanguageData.CookVinegarMochi5.label: 醋饼(5)
LanguageData.CookVinegarMochi5.description: 用冻过的米饼、醋还要有萝卜泥来制作醋饼
LanguageData.CookIsobeMochi5.label: 矶辺饼(5)
LanguageData.CookIsobeMochi5.description: 用冻过的米饼、酱油还有海苔来制作矶辺饼
LanguageData.CookGoheiMochi5.label: 五平饼(5)
LanguageData.CookGoheiMochi5.description: 用冻过的米饼和味噌来制作五平饼
LanguageData.CookZundaMochi5.label: 豆泥饼(5)
LanguageData.CookZundaMochi5.description: 用捣碎的毛豆泥包裹焙米饼来制成糕点
